The Templar Protectorate of Arthale

The Templar Protectorate of Arthale was the last of the three great nations to emerge from the collapse of The Arthalean Empire, founded by a religous coup at the capital city, Helligiem, and eventually claiming all of the old The Arthalean Empire's territories eastward of the Cloudcrest Mountains.

The Templar Protectorate of Arthale is ruled by the cardinal of their Solenist church, and all its military affairs are conducted under the banner of the Temple; the Temple of the protectorate has only one Grand Master.
